# Collection of tidying names

hexes <- data.frame(
  progress = c(
    "adopted",
    "in progress",
    "not started/no info"
  ),
  hex = c(
    "#00703c",
    "#e8850c",
    "#e2eefa"
  )
)

nps$progress[is.na(nps$progress)] <- "not started/no info"

nps <- left_join(nps, hexes, by = "progress")

nps <- st_transform(nps, 4326)

par_label <- sprintf(
  "<strong>%s</strong><br/>%s",
  nps$PAR22NM, nps$progress
) %>% lapply(htmltools::HTML)

nps_map <- leaflet() |> 
  addTiles(group = "Topo") |> 
  addPolygons(
    data = nps,
    group = "Parish",
    color = "black",
    opacity = 1,
    weight = 2,
    fillColor = nps$hex,
    fillOpacity = 0.7,
    highlightOptions = highlightOptions(
      color = "white",
      weight = 4,
      fill = "#666",
      fillOpacity = 0.9,
      bringToFront = TRUE
    ),
    label = par_label,
    labelOptions = labelOptions(
      style = list("font-weigth" = "normal", padding = "3px 8px"),
      textsize = "20px",
      direction = "auto"
    ),
  ) |> 
  addLayersControl(
    data = nps,
    overlayGroups = c(
      "Parish"
    ),
    position = "bottomright"
  ) |> 
  addSearchFeatures(
    targetGroups = c("Parish", nps$PAR22NM),
    options = searchFeaturesOptions(
      hideMarkerOnCollapse = TRUE,
      zoom = 12
    )) |> 
  addFullscreenControl()
